channel.title: The Straits Times Singapore News
channel.description: The Straits Times - Get exclusive stories, in-depth analyses and award-winning multimedia content about Singapore, Asia and the world.

item.title: How climate change affects Singapore
item.description:
June 03, 2020 4:00 AM

Many might think that climate change is insignificant because we contribute just 0.11 per cent to global emissions. However, experts emphasise that everyone plays a part in resolving the crisis of climate change. Here, The Straits Timesâ€™ climate change editor David Fogarty and environment correspondent Audrey Tan explain the direct impact of climate change on Singapore.
